thread.title: Major fire in Stoke sparks more than 70 calls to fire service
thread.title_full: Major fire in Stoke sparks more than 70 calls to fire service - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Major fire in Stoke sparks more than 70 calls to fire service
text:
Credit: John Owen/Stoke Police North Firefighters in Stoke-on-Trent are battling with a major fire which broke out earlier this morning in Milton.
Staffordshire Fire Service says it received 78 calls in just ten minutes about the blaze and has sent six fire engines to fight it.
Staffordshire Fire @StaffsFire Follow We have had 78 calls in 10 minutes to a large fire in Milton, Stoke on Trent. We have 6 fire engines en route. More to follow...
08:36 - 5 Feb 2017 Retweet Reply Favourite West Midlands Stoke-on-Trent
